explanation: [0-0] In a beige room, there is a whiteboard hanging on the back wall, a full-length mirror on the right side of the frame, and a crystal lamp above. There are three women in the room. The woman on the left side of the frame is wearing a black sports top and gray sweatpants with reddish-brown hair. The woman in the middle is wearing a colorful jacket and white pants with black hair. The woman on the right side of the frame is wearing a dark gray top and black pants with golden hair.
[0-2] The camera turns to the right, the three people turn their heads to the front and wave one hand.
[0-2] The camera turns to the right, the three people turn their heads to the front and wave one hand.

[2-11] Immediately, the three of them lean back at the same time, swing their heads left and right, swing their hands on both sides of their bodies, and tap their feet. Then put their hands in front of them, bend their legs slightly, continue to swing their hands and body to dance, and their heads are shaking constantly. Then the action changes to raising both hands with fists clenched, and finally putting down the hands and jumping.

[11-15] The women on the left and right sides of the frame move forward with their hands swinging up and down, and the woman in the middle moves backward with her hands swinging, and then the three of them move in unison with their hands swinging in front of them. The camera pulls down, the three people get closer, stretch out one foot and place it in the middle of the picture, facing the toes.

[15-19] Finally, the camera pulls back, the three women withdraw their feet, raise their hands and swing them, twist their bodies, and finally the woman on the left side of the frame jumps up with one foot raised. The three of them smiled slightly, raised their hands together and compared scissors, stopped dancing and stood in the middle of the picture.
